outputs.output_descr: Mainstreamed biodiversity conservation and sustainable use into production landscapes and sectors, promoting energy efficient and renewable energy technologies in rural communities in targeted landscapes; maintaining and improving flows of agro and forest ecosystem services in dry lands of Arid or Semi Arid Regions to sustain livelihoods of local communities; capacity development and knowledge management..

project_descr: Community level action conserves biodiversity, reverses land degradation and mitigates climate change in priority landscape across India
project_title: GEF Small Grants Programme - 5th Operational Phase
